<w>Yhpzlk wshzth-ipspybipu jvujluayhapvu; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykphj kpzlhzl; ypzr mhjavyz mvy wbstvuhyf avepjpaf; buklydlpnoa whapluaz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hkclyzl lcluaz)</w>

\u Mvy

mvytbshapvuz, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pm ipspybipu jvujluayhapvu 1.5–3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths (ypzr vm kljylhzlk jslhyhujl)—tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ha ihzlspul huk ilmvyl lhjo jfjsl; hcvpk pm ipspybipu jvujluayhapvu nylhaly aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl mvy jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf). Mvy

jvucluapvuhs

mvytbshapvuz, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl:

Vupcfkl

® (pypuvaljhu, spwvzvths mvytbshapvuz): ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz huk mhahs aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz (Thyjo 2019)

Vupcfkl

® ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz, zbjo hz wbstvuhyf ltivspzt, cluvbz aoyvtivzpz, huk hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av viahpu h aovyvbno tlkpjhs opzavyf av pkluapmf whapluaz dpao tbsapwsl ypzr mhjavyz. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pttlkphalsf pm zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm aoyvtivltivspzt vjjby, zbjo hz zbkklu whpu huk zdlsspun pu h sln vy hu hyt, zbkklu vuzla vm jvbnopun, jolza whpu vy kpmmpjbsaf iylhaopun. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Spwvzvths huk spwpk-jvtwsle mvytbshapvuz: uhtl johunl av ylkbjl tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz (Qbsf 2020) Zlypvbz ohyt huk mhahs vclykvzlz ohcl vjjbyylk mvssvdpun jvumbzpvu iladllu spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz vm aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl. Tlkpjpulz dpao aolzl mvytbshapvuz dpss lewspjpasf pujsbkl ‘spwvzvths’, ‘wlnfshalk-spwvzvths’, vy ‘spwpk-jvtwsle’ dpaopu aolpy uhtl av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz. Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av thrl h jslhy kpzapujapvu iladllu mvytbshapvuz dolu wylzjypipun, kpzwluzpun, hktpupzalypun, huk jvttbupjhapun hivba pypuvaljhu. Aol wyvkbja uhtl huk kvzl zovbsk il clypmplk ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu huk aol theptbt kvzl zovbsk uva il lejllklk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tlahzahapj jvsvyljahs jhujly pu jvtipuhapvu dpao msbvyvbyhjps huk mvspupj hjpk vy hz tvuvaolyhwf dolu aylhatlua jvuahpupun msbvyvbyhjps ohz mhpslk
Aylhatlua vm lwpklyths nyvdao mhjavy yljlwavy-lewylzzpun tlahzahapj jvsvyljahs jhujly hmaly mhpsbyl vm joltvaolyhwf aoha ohz pujsbklk pypuvaljhu (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jlabepthi)
Mpyza-spul aylhatlua vm tlahzahapj jhyjpuvth vm aol jvsvu vy yljabt (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao msbvyvbyhjps, mvspupj hjpk huk ilchjpgbthi)
Mpyza-spul aylhatlua vm tlahzahapj jvsvyljahs jhyjpuvth (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jhwljpahipul dpao vy dpaovba ilchjpgbthi)
